about_the_game:
Chivalrish is a novella-sized, romance visual novel set in a medieval fantasy world. Set out on an adventure to rescue a princess who is not at all like you imagined a princess to be. Meet characters along the way, and decide your fate and theirs in this fun, comical, and thrilling journey.

Get ready for an adventure.

Rumor has it that there is a princess being harbored against her will in a tower that is fiercely defended by a fire-breathing dragon. Knights were summoned all over the land to save the princess, yet none have returned.

Will you, a washed up mercenary, step up to the challenge?

You play as Barry Winthrop – the self proclaimed “handsomest lad in all the land” and mercenary who once saved an entire kingdom from vicious, man-eating creatures known as wights . However you have wasted the last six years visiting pubs and filling your belly with ale. After hearing rumors about a locked up princess, you seize the opportunity to rescue her in hopes of reigniting your passion for adventure.

Features

2 love interests

Choices that will lead you to one of the 3 main endings and 1 secret ending.

Charming, vivid characters and side characters that bring the world to life!

content_descriptors.notes: There are depictions of fighting within the game that may not be suitable to people who are sensitive to violence, blood, and death. This includes characters battling with swords, magic, and claws. This story also includes alcohol use and acts of kidnapping, although these themes are never abused in ways that harm the characters in this story.
